title: Bug 24817[Editor Mgmt] NPE logged when restoring editor on deleted resource
description: Build 20021015When checking out a bunch of changes from CVS, many editors previously openedonto stale units (on repository, units have moved to different packagelocation), did not close automatically.When selecting them, the log got populated with following stack dumps.Other than the log, the behavior was acceptable, though I would have preferredif it had warned me once for all stale editors (close|close all|cancel).!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Oct 16, 2002 12:10:51.890!MESSAGE Unable to restore editor  createElement returned null for input element factory: org.eclipse.ui.part.FileEditorInputFactoryUnable to restore editor  createElement returned null for input element factory: org.eclipse.ui.part.FileEditorInputFactory!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Oct 16,
